details: Boosted team ranking dramatically, moving from over 3000 to the top 500 in Round 3.

Designed and implemented a delayed time‑series linear regression strategy in C#, integrating moving average techniques to predict and exploit market trends, resulting in a marked improvement in prediction accuracy.
Automated AWS infrastructure by streamlining the removal of ECS workers for disapproved challenges, saving over 260 hours of manual labor annually.
Engineered a Django Admin dashboard to manage EC2 instances, reducing setup times by 50% and significantly enhancing operational efficiency.
Developed a data pipeline on AWS using Python and Bash scripts to collect daily resource utilization metrics (CPU, memory).
Adjusted ECS worker count, CPU, and memory dynamically using collected metrics, based on conditions like resource thresholds.
Automated data collection on AWS using Lambda and Step Functions, storing raw data in Amazon S3 for scalable and secure storage.
Transformed and curated data with PySpark in AWS SageMaker, enabling structured analysis and efficient querying to support predictive modeling workflows.
